item.title: Is this right..?

item.description:
@God_of_servers wrote:

Umm… Is this were i enter my Hamachi IP in the source under client.java? (Shut up i know Hamachi’s bad I’m sorry my router won’t let me port foward)

playerServer = inStream.readString(); } catch (Exception e) { playerServer = "My Hamachi IP";?

I added the “my hamachi Id” thing

Read full topic
